argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psrbas.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 2 |  | psrbas.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | psrbas.d | |- D = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } |
| 4 |  | psrbas.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 5 |  | psrelbas.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 6 |  | #P_reldmpsr | |- Rel dom mPwSer |
| 7 | 6, 1, 4 | #P_elbasov | |- ( X e. B -> ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( I e. _V /\ R e. _V ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> I e. _V ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 9 | #P_psrbas | |- ( ph -> B = ( K ^m D ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ph -> X e. ( K ^m D ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_eqeltri | |- K e. _V |
| 14 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( NN0 ^m I ) e. _V |
| 15 | 3, 14 | #P_rabex2 | |- D e. _V |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_elmap | |- ( X e. ( K ^m D ) <-> X : D --> K ) |
| 17 | 11, 16 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> X : D --> K ) |
